vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
γυμνότης, ητος, ἡ,
nakedness, [LXX+NT+1st c.AD+]
__2 bare statement, τῶν προτάσεων [Refs 1st c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
nakedness, insufficiently clothed
nakedness; want of proper and sufficient clothing, Rom. 8:35; 2Cor. 11:27; spiritual nakedness, being destitute of spiritual clothing, Rev. 3:18*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 赤身露體 #啟 3:18|
2) 赤身露體:匱乏之意 #羅 8:35; 林後 11:27|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 赤身露体 #启 3:18|
2) 赤身露体:匮乏之意 #罗 8:35; 林后 11:27|
